Archer.name: Archer
Archer.description: Ranged combatants with training is the use of bows.

Berserker.name: Berserker
Berserker.description: A rage-fueled warrior which prefers two-handed attacks using Heavy weapons.

Creation.name: Creation
Creation.description: A magically fashioned and conjured creation corresponding to a particular arcane essence.

Fighter.name: Fighter
Fighter.description: Hardened melee combatants expert at weilding one-handed weaponry, shield, and heavy armor.

Grappler.name: Grappler
Grappler.description: Fighters who specialize in physically restraining their adversaries and rendering them susceptible to further attacks.

Mage.name: Mage
Mage.description: A magic user which wields flame and electricity in battle.

Occultist.name: Occultist
Occultist.description: Magic users who practice spellcraft using otherworldly and eldritch forces.

Skirmisher.name: Skirmisher
Skirmisher.description: A relentless and determined melee combatant that uses a mix of agility and power to subdue foes.

Tusker.name: Tusker
Tusker.description: Beasts that fight using their own mass, momentum, and sharpened tusks.
